prompt: The website snopes.com investigates and posts information about whether common stories that are passed around are true or false. In which of the following situations would this be a useful source of information?
feedback: The website snopes.com investigates stories that are passed around and lets you know whether they’re true or false. Often, false stories warning about new kinds of crimes are passed around. If a friend re-posts a story from somewhere else warning about a new kind of crime, it would be useful to look it up on snopes.com to see if there’s information about whether it’s true or false.
